name: Chaldal
description:
Chaldal.com is an online shop based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is a service rooted on the idea that shopping for necessities should not be a burden. At Chaldal, we believe that time is valuable to our fellow Dhaka residents, and that they should not have to waste hours in traffic, brave the weather and wait in line just to buy some eggs – which is why we deliver everything you need right at your door-step and at no additional cost!

Chaldal is a work in progress, and we hope to get better over time. We are firm believers in using technology to improve Bangladesh, and we will continue to invest all our effort in pushing the boundaries of technology in this country.

**Chaldal: Revolutionizing Grocery Shopping in Bangladesh**

Founded in 2013, Chaldal is an online grocery platform that has quickly become essential for many households in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The idea is simple but powerful: grocery shopping should not consume your time and patience. With traffic jams, unpredictable weather, and long checkout lines, the last thing anyone wants to do is spend hours on mundane errands. That’s where Chaldal comes in, delivering a wide range of products right to your doorstep, hassle-free, and without any extra charges.

The company operates on the belief that time is valuable. Instead of forcing residents to brave the elements or battle through congested streets, Chaldal is committed to making essential shopping as seamless as possible. With over *15,000 products* available—from groceries to household essentials—customers can expect delivery within an hour of placing their orders.

Chaldal is not just about convenience; it's also about leveraging technology to improve the quality of life in Bangladesh. The team is continuously exploring innovative solutions to enhance their service. Currently, Chaldal runs 26 warehouses across Bangladesh and has successfully delivered over *5 million orders* to around *100,000 families*. Impressive numbers, right?

With a team of nearly *2,886 employees*, Chaldal is a large, dedicated workforce that strives to innovate and elevate the grocery shopping experience. They're proud alumni of Y Combinator's S15 batch, a testament to their startup acumen and potential.

The platform offers various categories to shop from, including:
- Grocery
- Pharmacy
- Home and Kitchen
- Personal Care
- Health and Wellness
- Baby Care
- Pet Care, and more.

Their marketing strategy also includes lucrative offers such as deals of the day, cash back through their Egg Club membership, and premium customer support for added convenience.

Chaldal is currently operational in Dhaka, Chattogram, and Jashore, making it accessible to a significant portion of the population.

Delivery fees are kept reasonable, with costs designed to remain competitive. For example, delivery in Dhaka starts at *৳39* for orders above *৳400*, promoting affordability alongside convenience.

The takeaway? Chaldal is shaping the future of grocery shopping in Bangladesh—making it faster, easier, and more efficient. If you're in the area, you might want to check them out at [Chaldal.com](http://chaldal.com). 

Their vision? To constantly improve, survive the trials of urban life in Bangladesh, and make sure that shopping for necessities is anything but a burden.
